name: shadow-bone
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.
